pages.title: ⤝ Two of Swords ⤝
pages.text: Spirit of Peace Restored$(br)      ☽ Moon in ♎ Libra

A blindfolded figure balances two swords upon their hands seemingly with their own mental power.$(br)  They seem vigilant as if to defend against all comers, without distinguishing between them.$(br)  At their back, the sea is calm, and the night is clear.$(br)  The number two suggests dualities, or opposites, possibly extreme differences.$(br)  The blindfold suggests incomplete, unseen, or unresolved, issues in a

person's life.$(br)  They are poised as if waiting for their final struggle but cannot see they are in fact safe. $(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Looking at the true nature of something.$(br)  Unblinking in the face of danger, courage.$(br)  Dualities, sharp differences between perspectives.
$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Looking away from something. Falsehood, duplicity.$(br)  May also mean resolving difficult issues.
